Name: Cat and Ghostly Road
About the game: Cat and Ghostly Road is an atmospheric point-and-click quest in which you play as a white cat. Once the painter saved the cat, and they began to live together. But one day a misfortune happened to the man. You need to help the man and save him from death. To do this, you have to go on a dangerous journey to the world of ghosts and demons. Not all things are what they seems: in order to see their true form, you have a special vision.
